rows.label: tlk70000021_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard a hullabaloo. Did
something happen at the plaza?

rows.label: tlk70000021_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I got lost in my work, and at some point
the fuss finally died down. I haven't
talked to anyone but Zain all day.

rows.label: tlk70000021_03_msg0003
rows.name: Don't get me started about him.

rows.label: tlk70000021_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I was trying to tell him about ship
plans today, and he just made a face
at me and walked off without a word.

rows.label: tlk70000021_03_msg0005
rows.name:
If you've got something to say, just
say it, pal. That's what I think. The
two of us don't mesh well at all.
